c74object.name: sp.folder
c74object.digest: A utility for looping through all the samples in a folder
c74object.description: A utility for looping through all the samples in a folder.

discussion.p: The sp.folderloop object is used in conjunction with sp.corpusanalysis to analyze every sample in a folder for the required descriptors and metadata.
